author: Nick Tsiotinos
comment: Didn't work initially - but the save to Pocket and sharing to other apps direct from the watch is really what I love about this. Who wants to sit there reading on the watch?

reply.author: Visual Candy Apps
reply.content:
Hi Nick,

Sorry to hear you are having trouble.

We can't recreate your issue, but we will do a release today so that you can send us your log file.

Can you please send us an email so we can let you know once we have released?

Kindest regards

title: Quick update response. Excellent for saving articles.
